ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: What game features would you like to see added?
ygData.msgSnippet: BUT, with LDoN, this is supposed to be somewhat possible... not necessarily changing the look of things but to give any item special properties. So there will
ygData.messageBody:
BUT, with LDoN, this is supposed to be somewhat possible... not necessarily changing the look of things but to give any item special properties. So there will literally be limitless possibilities for items in the game now.
 
In a message dated 8/21/2003 1:59:53 AM Eastern Standard Time, scendera@... writes:
Unfortunately, going by what they've said in the past, never gonna happen. If adding ONE model (Iksar skellie pets for Iksar necros and SKs) sucks up too much resources and would require too much  recoding to be feasible, then adding seperate, interchangable parts like taller collars or optional horns for helms would likely fall under the same limitations.
 
"Sail to your heart's desires, and know when to drop anchor."
